tables.table:
id int
insert into form_remind(name,kind,table_name,date_field,is_sms,is_msg,is_email,ahead_day,ahead_hour,ahead_minute,title,content,user_name,users,roles,user_field,filter) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) update form_remind set name=?,kind=?,table_name=?,date_field=?,is_sms=?,is_msg=?,is_email=?,ahead_day=?,ahead_hour=?,ahead_minute=?,title=?,content=?,user_name=?,users=?,roles=?,user_field=?,filter=? where id=? select id,name,kind,table_name,date_field,is_sms,is_msg,is_email,ahead_day,ahead_hour,ahead_minute,title,content,user_name,users,roles,user_field,filter from form_remind where id=?, select id from form_view delete from form_remind where id=?
100 form_checker_oa.xml true true

id int
insert into report_manage(id,name,upload_path,description,report_date,priv_code,priv_desc,username,alter_date) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?) update report_manage set name=?,upload_path=?,description=?,report_date=?,priv_code=?,priv_desc=?,username=?,alter_date=? where id=? select id,name,upload_path,description,report_date,priv_code,priv_desc,username,alter_date from report_manage where id=?, select id from report_manage delete from report_manage where id=?
100 form_checker_oa.xml true true
